db:abstract.db:para: Describes a touch point in a MultiPointTouchArea.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The TouchPoint type contains information about a touch point, such as the current position, pressure, and area.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] x : real
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the current position of the touch point.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] area : rectangle
db:section.db:para: These properties hold additional information about the current state of the touch point.

db:listitem.db:para: pressure is a value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.
velocity is a vector with magnitude reported in pixels per second.
area is a rectangle covering the area of the touch point, centered on the current position of the touch point.

db:section.db:para: Not all touch devices support velocity. If velocity is not supported, it will be reported as 0,0.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] startX : real
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the starting position of the touch point.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] previousX : real
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the previous position of the touch point.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] sceneX : real
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the current position of the touch point in scene coordinates.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] pointId : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the point id of the touch point.
Each touch point within a MultiPointTouchArea will have a unique id.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] pressed : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the touch point is currently pressed.
